DOC.brief_summary: Subjects with type 2 diabetes will be stratified into two-quantiles based on ambient hyperglycemia (fasting glucose and HbA1c) and then the effects of a single aerobic exercise bout (1-hour at 50%VO2max) on pancreatic endocrine function will be determined.
DOC.brief_title: Acute Exercise and Pancreatic Endocrine Function
DOC.criteria: Previous diagnosis with type 2 diabetes, or newly detected in our screening procedures Age 3070 years BMI 2040 kg/m2 Treatment with insulin Contraindication to exercise as determined by ECG Pregnancy Active weight loss in the previous 6 months Actively engaged in exercise training programs Evidence of chronic pulmonary, cardiovascular, hepatic, renal, or hematological disease
